rma.status_check: To check the repair status, please enter your RMA number or the device's serial number.
rma.form_info: To ensure that nothing is overlooked, we have created an RMA form. By completing this form and including it with your package, we will receive all the necessary information in advance, which will help reduce processing time during package intake. Thank you for your cooperation!
rma.tracking_info: On this page, you can check the contents of your shipment, track the repair status, and update payment details or address any other issues if necessary. Login information will also be sent to the email address you provided with the package.
rma.process_info: Once we receive your package, the contract is concluded. We assign your package an RMA number and create a dedicated page for it. You can access this page by entering the tracking number provided by your shipping service in the corresponding field (yellow label) on our homepage.

welcome.warranty_info: If you have a warranty claim or a service pack agreement, please provide the name of the reseller.
welcome.error_description: Please provide a detailed error description, as this greatly increases the likelihood of a successful repair.
welcome.contract_info: By sending the package, a repair contract is established between you (the sender) and us (the recipient). You are responsible for the shipping costs to us, while we will cover the return shipping costs. Inspection and cost estimation are provided free of charge.
